name: mixxx-1.11.0-macintel-beta
short_description:
READ BEFORE INSTALLING***
In order to safely install this program, you will need to download and open the files labeled "For Mac" (if you are a mac user) or "For Windows" (If you are a windows user). These files will modify your hard drive in order to safely install the program (nothing will be deleted). Once that has been done, please download the "mixxx1110macintelbeta" file and once that's done downloading you can now enjoy the new and improved Mixxx program. If there's any problems please contact mixxxbeta@mac.com . Thanks for mixxxing with us.
summary: The New and Highly Advance Mixxx specially for Producers!
